description:
Go deep in yin class, or kick things up a notch at HIIT. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and comfortable, and a touch of spandex lets you move freely. An interior shelf bra offers casual comfort for low-impact workouts, with a brushed elastic band that's soft on your skin.Moisture-wicking recycled polyester and spandex compression ribbed fabric.Interior shelf bra with removable cups and brushed elastic for next-to-skin comfort.Flatlock seams.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Prana Becksa Tank - Women's
